it.unibo.ai.didattica.competition.tablut.domain

Interface Game

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameModernTablut, GameTablut

    public interface Game
    Contains the rules of the game

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      State checkMove(State state, Action a)
      This method checks an action in a state: if it is correct the state is going to be changed, if it is wrong it throws a specific exception
      void endGame(State state) 

    • Method Detail

      • checkMove

        State checkMove(State state,
                Action a)
         throws BoardException,
                ActionException,
                StopException,
                PawnException,
                DiagonalException,
                ClimbingException,
                ThroneException,
                OccupiedException,
                ClimbingCitadelException,
                CitadelException
        This method checks an action in a state: if it is correct the state is going to be changed, if it is wrong it throws a specific exception
        Parameters:
        state - the state of the game
        a - the action to be analyzed
        Returns:
        the new state of the game
        Throws:
        BoardException - try to move a pawn out of the board
        ActionException - the format of the action is wrong
        StopException - try to not move any pawn
        PawnException - try to move an enemy pawn
        DiagonalException - try to move a pawn diagonally
        ClimbingException - try to climb over another pawn
        ThroneException - try to move a pawn into the throne boxe
        OccupiedException - try to move a pawn into an ccupited box
        ClimbingCitadelException
        CitadelException

      • endGame

        void endGame(State state)
